Advanced CNC system (CypCut or Raytools): Advanced CNC system (CypCut or Raytools) with intuitive interface for easy programming and operation. Supports complex path planning, automatic nesting, and real-time monitoring. Compatible with standard file formats (DXF, DWG) for seamless CAD/CAM integration.
High-precision servo motor drive system: High-precision servo motor drive system with precision ball screws and linear guides. Provides fast acceleration, high positioning accuracy, and smooth motion control. Dual-drive design ensures synchronized movement and long-term stability.

Precision gas delivery system with autom: Precision gas delivery system with automatic pressure control for oxygen, nitrogen, or air assist. Industrial water chiller maintains optimal laser source temperature. Dust extraction system ensures clean cutting environment and protects optical components from contamination.

Common questions about our punching mach: Common questions about our punching machines
Single table punching machines have one: Single table punching machines have one fixed working table, offering a more economical solution suitable for low to medium production volumes. Dual table machines feature two exchangeable tables that allow for continuous operation - while one table is cutting, the other can be loaded/unloaded, significantly increasing productivity by reducing idle time.
Our punching machines can process variou: Our punching machines can process various thicknesses of carbon steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper/brass (thicknesses vary based on machine capacity). Higher tonnage machines can process thicker materials. The machines handle various metals including mild steel, stainless steel, galvanized steel, aluminum alloys, copper, brass, and other sheet metals.
Fiber lasers are nearly maintenance-free: Fiber lasers are nearly maintenance-free compared to CO2 lasers. Regular maintenance includes: cleaning protective lenses weekly, checking water chiller levels, inspecting gas pressure, and cleaning dust extraction filters. The fiber laser source itself requires no maintenance and has a lifespan of 100,000+ hours. No laser gas refills or mirror alignments are needed.
Yes, we provide comprehensive support in: Yes, we provide comprehensive support including on-site installation, machine commissioning, and operator training (typically 3-5 days). Training covers machine operation, CNC programming, parameter optimization, basic maintenance, and troubleshooting. Complete operation manuals and video tutorials are also provided.
Operating costs include electricity (fib: Operating costs include electricity (fiber lasers are highly efficient with ~30% electro-optical conversion), assist gas (nitrogen, oxygen, or compressed air), water chiller electricity, and occasional consumables (protective lenses, nozzles). Fiber lasers are more cost-effective than CO2 lasers due to lower power consumption and minimal maintenance requirements.
Standard configuration machines typicall: Standard configuration machines typically ship within 30-45 days after order confirmation. Custom specifications or higher power configurations may require 45-60 days. We provide regular production updates and coordinate logistics to ensure smooth delivery and installation.
Get detailed technical specifications, d: Get detailed technical specifications, dimensions, and performance data for our fiber punching machines. Download our comprehensive product brochure in PDF format.
